content.text:
# 1887 Wentworth colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Wentworth on 28 September 1887 because of the resignation of William MacGregor ().
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 5 September 1887
| William MacGregor resigned.
|-
| 8 September 1887
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 22 September 1887
| Nominations
|-
| 28 September 1887
| Polling day
|-
| 11 October 1887
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
William MacGregor () resigned.
